an10.120:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the noble descent.
an10.120:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. …
an10.120:4.3: And what is the noble descent?
an10.120:4.4: It’s when a noble disciple reflects:
an10.120:4.6: in the present life and in lives to come.’
an10.120:4.7: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong view,
an10.120:4.18: in the present life and in lives to come.’
an10.120:4.19: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong freedom,
an10.120:4.21: This is called the noble descent.”
